survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of our digital learning platform to improve functionality, content, and overall user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use the digital learning platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. This helps segment users by engagement level.

script.question_text: How often do you use the digital learning platform?

questions.question_text: Which features do you use most frequently on the platform? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Helps identify popular features.

script.question_text: Which features do you use most frequently on the platform? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of the content provided on the platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction levels. Single-choice radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of the content provided on the platform?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the platform's content?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the platform's content?

questions.question_text: How easy is it to navigate the platform?

script.question_text: How easy is it to navigate the platform?

questions.question_text: Have you encountered any technical issues while using the platform?
questions.client_notes: Binary question to identify technical problems. Radio buttons recommended.

script.question_text: Have you encountered any technical issues while using the platform?

questions.question_text: If yes, please describe the technical issue you encountered.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended follow-up to Q6. Only appears if user selects 'Yes'.

script.question_text: If yes, please describe the technical issue you encountered.

questions.question_text: How responsive has the customer support team been to your inquiries?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale question to evaluate customer support.

script.question_text: How responsive has the customer support team been to your inquiries?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this platform to others?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS) potential.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this platform to others?

questions.question_text: What additional features or content would you like to see added to the platform?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather innovative suggestions.

script.question_text: What additional features or content would you like to see added to the platform?
